partnerDetails.about:
LTEA undertakes design, engineering, manufacturing, integration, supply, installation and commissioning of systems centered around the following:

  • Telecommunication & Security System (Part 1)
    • Unified Control Centre
    • Security & Surveillance: Security systems including CCTV System, Access Control System, Subsea & Onshore Intrusion Detection and intelligent Video Analytics.
    • Backbone communication network: SDH / PDH, DWDM / ATM / OTN, Microwave, IP Transport
    • Data Networks: LAN / WAN, Structured Cabling, etc.
    • Audio Visuals: Public Address & General Alarm, EPABX, Telephony System, Hotline System, Conference system, Video Wall, Digital Signage, IPTV system, Broadcast system.
    • Wireless & Radio Communication: Tetra, UHF / VHF Radio, VSAT, GRPS / 3G, Marine Radio.
    • Marine & Offshore Systems: Marine Radio, Non Directional Beacon, Ground to Air Communication, Weather Monitoring.
    • Physical Security: Integrated BRE approved delay rated security Fence, Boom Bollard, Drop Arm, Tyre Killer, etc
  • Instrumentation & Automation System (Part 2)
    • Unified Control Centre
    • Supervisory Control & Data Acquisition Systems (SCADA)
    • Programmable Controller Systems(PLC)/ Remote Telemetry Unit (RTU)
    • Distributed Control Systems (DCS)
    • Emergency Shut Down (ESD) & Fire & Gas System (FGS)
    • Field Instruments
    • Specialized packages such as Leak Detection system, PIS (Plant Information System), CMS (Condition Monitoring System), CMMS (Computerized Maintenance Management System), MIS (Management Information System), MES (Manufacturing Execution System, ERP integration,
    • MV/LV Variable Frequency Drives & Softstarters
    • Integrated Solar Power System & Passive Cooling shelter

LTEA has continuously delivered world class integrated solutions and as part of the Schneider Electric family, LTEA is confident of supporting customers in their digitalization drive bringing value, sustainability and efficiency to the customer's operations.
